title: Log a Near-Miss Incident
description: A worker dropped a tool from scaffolding, but no one was injured. A safety officer needs to log this as a 'near-miss' to prevent future occurrences.

tasks.description: Create a new safety incident report.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new report form is generated.

tasks.description: Describe the event and classify the incident as 'Near-Miss'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The report is correctly filled out and classified.

tasks.description: Recommend a corrective action: 'Hold a toolbox talk on tool tethering for all crews working at height.'
tasks.expected_outcome: A relevant, preventative corrective action is recommended.
